short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Project Management
description: Project Management Consulting for Canadian Government. The Contract Period runs from the date of award until March 31, 2025, with six option periods for renewal.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Project Scheduling and Planning Services**
=====================================

**Notice Title:** EQ754-232267A Project Scheduling and Planning Services

**Reference Number:** WS3975058302-Doc4007110577

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Publication Date:** May 16, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** June 5, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Procurement Category:** Service

**Project Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a project management consultant firm to provide project planning and scheduling services for the construction of a crown-controlled facility. The services required include managing the project planning, design development, and construction phases.

**Contract Period:** The contract period is from the date of award until March 31, 2025, with six irrevocable one-year option periods.

**Requirements:**

* One senior and one intermediate Project Planner to assist the PWGSC Senior Project Manager in preparing necessary documents and managing project planning phases.
* Security clearance requirement for this work.

**Selection Criteria:**

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Notice URL:**

You can access the full notice at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16295091?extsite=MTYyOTUwOTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**

* Andrew Jefferson, SPAC/PSPC, andrew.jefferson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Language of the Notice:**

English and French.

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* North American Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* Canada
